EmailTemplate.subject: Retail Apps Report: How the Biggest Retailers Perform on Mobile
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
U.S. Retail Apps Report 2014 <http://pivotallabs.com/us-retail-apps-report-2014>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Nearly one year has passed since our last U.S. Retail Apps Report. How have retail apps evolved and do they meet the needs of their users? See how consumers have rated the top retailersâ€™ apps on iOS and Android with this exclusive report.
Download the report here <http://pivotallabs.com/us-retail-apps-report-2014>.
Please feel free to connect with us if you have any questions, and enjoy the paper!
Sincerely, Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
